name: Persistent Rent Arrears
short_description: Arrears at or above threshold reached at least three times in 3 years

requirements.pattern: 2 months' (or 8 weeks') arrears accrued at least three separate times in past 3 years
requirements.current_position: May be under threshold now but history must show repeated breaches

evidence_required: Rent account showing pattern of arrears
Documentation of at least 3 instances reaching threshold
Proof of arrears history over 3-year period
